original_title: The Adventures of Timmy the Tooth: Rainy Day Adventure
overview: During a rainy day, Timmy imagines that he is Captain Good Guy, and Brushbrush is his first mate. They work to save Sunny the Sun from The Cavity Goon and Miss Sweety.

production_companies.name: Universal Studios Home Entertainment Family Productions

title: The Adventures of Timmy the Tooth: Rainy Day Adventure
